Class StaffDmView.ChatListItem

java.lang.Object
application.StaffDmView.ChatListItem
Enclosing class:
StaffDmView
private static class StaffDmView.ChatListItem extends Object
Inner class to represent a chat list item in the staff view.

This class encapsulates information about a chat including the chat ID, both users' usernames, last message, and timestamp.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    private final int
    chatId
    The database ID of the chat
    private final String
    lastMessage

    timestamp
    The timestamp of the last message
    private final String
    user1
    The username of the first user in the chat
    private final String
    user2
    The username of the second user in the chat
